publications.title: Energy Disaggregation using Elastic Matching Algorithms
publications.abstract: This paper presents a novel approach for energy disaggregation using elastic matching algorithms. The proposed method enables accurate identification of individual appliance energy consumption from aggregate household power data, contributing to smart grid optimization and energy efficiency.
